agendaPreview.noBookingText: You don’t currently have any bookings for this day. Go ahead and fill your boots!

activities.displayName: Box Office: Shows Reservation Help Desk
activities.shortDescription: Book your show reservations with ease.
activities.longDescription: Book show tickets and get all your box office questions answered at our shows reservation help desk.
activities.introduction: Our show reservations help desk is here to assist you with all your box office needs.

activities.shortDescription: If the concept of Zen hosted a housewarming party.
activities.longDescription: Sets at The Roundabout are heavy on anthemic pop and uplifting house music, mixed seamlessly with pop hits, dance jams, and Latin grooves. Bask in a soundtrack equally well-suited for chatting over cocktails and dancing with your hands in the air.
activities.introduction: The Roundabout is a haven of remix culture, blending time-tested bops with the music of emerging and trending artists for a bouncy, joyful feel.

activities.shortDescription: For help using our app, head to our help desk.
activities.longDescription: Our app is a one-stop-shop for all your voyage needs. But if you need any assistance at all using or navigating it, our help desk has you covered.
activities.introduction: Need help with our mobile app? Our help desk will be able to assist you.

activities.shortDescription: An assembly drill for ship safety.
activities.longDescription: We know, we know—the logistical stuff. But don't worry, we've even given this the Virgin makeover. Roll Call will cover everything you need to know in case of an emergency while on board—who to call, what to do and where to go. To ensure a quick experience, please watch the very Virgin safety video in the VV app or the TV in your cabin before you arrive at Roll Call. Trust us. It's a can't-miss event. Literally. Legally. No, seriously!
activities.introduction: Head to the Assembly Station for a mandatory safety briefing and overview of the onboard protocol in case of an emergency.
instructionDetails: This is required
Please watch the safety vid on on your app or on your cabin television.

activities.displayName: Let’s Set Sail: Solo Sailor Meetup
activities.shortDescription: Bid farewell to land with your fellow solo Sailors
activities.longDescription: Join us at this exclusive meetup for our seafaring solo explorers, hosted by our effervescent Happenings Cast. Say bon voyage to the coastline as you toast to the endless possibilities at sea.
activities.introduction: There’s nothing sweeter than a solo sojourn, and if you’re looking to connect with others — here’s where to find them.

activities.shortDescription: Sail-away par-tay as we ship out to sea.
activities.longDescription: As we push away from shore and embark on an unforgettable voyage, we’ll be celebrating this electric moment as we make moves out to sea. Listening for the ship’s blast as we pull away from the terminal, our DJs will elevate the mood with some synergetic dance tracks, bottles of bubbles will start popping, and endless ocean views will transform into a blanket of stars — your epic sea change starts now.
activities.introduction: Welcome aboard, Sailor. Set sail with a sundowner cocktail and pinnacle party-view vibes as you head out into the horizon.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
The venue will open at the posted start time, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.shortDescription: Join The Casino Crew for lessons before we open.
activities.longDescription: Head to The Casino to learn a new game, get your questions answered, or simply get to know The Casino Crew on a personal level. Not only will you get some practice in before gaming kicks off, you'll have an opportunity to win free-play just for stopping by. And if you're feeling intimidated because you don’t know how to play (yet), our Crew would love to show you the ropes. Whether you want to learn craps, blackjack, poker, or slots — they know their ship.
activities.introduction: You're invited to come meet The Casino Crew before we open — while learning and practicing any of our games before it's time to get the dice rolling.
instructionDetails: The Casino is located on Deck 6 forward.
You'll be able to learn how to use your wearable, The Band, to earn rewards — so don't forget it.

activities.shortDescription: A dreamy onboard pajama party.
activities.longDescription: Because the name of the game is comfort, the dress code is simple: wear pajamas. Cozy PJs, zany PJs, even onesies — all styles welcome. Surprises will unravel through the night as you party with divas, rock stars, your best friends, and your new friends. There are plenty of comfy places to lounge, so snag a spot to cool off between dance numbers.
activities.introduction: Grab your favorite pair of pajamas for a dreamy party-turned-sleepover.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.

activities.shortDescription: One, two, three — Four Square Challenge.
activities.longDescription: Remember when you played four square as a kid and the winner was, like, the playground baddie? And if you didn’t, our Happenings Cast will explain the rules that are so straightforward, even a child can understand — because that’s usually who first learned these epic rules of engagement. Now’s the chance to relive your glory days (or give yourself a first or second chance) by becoming the most fantastic four square competitor in the world — or at least at sea.
activities.introduction: One body, two arms, four competitors: this is the ultimate four square showdown.

activities.shortDescription: A one-man band. Completely improvising. Live.
activities.longDescription: Join Flute Loops on a fast-paced musical journey through the new, the old, and everything in between. With nothing but a microphone, a guitar, a flute, and a loop station, Flute Loops — a one-man band — completely improvises his live performances mixing hip-hop beats with folk-funk harmonies for a Celtic crossover that will get you on your feet.
activities.introduction: Mixing hip-hop beats with traditional Irish harmonies, Flute Loops (aka Sean Regan) will enchant you with his ferocious rhythm and unique melodies.

activities.shortDescription: A story of friendship told through dance.
activities.longDescription: "Keepin’ It Together" is an evening of spectacular dancing, powerful vocals, and inevitable debauchery put together by longtime best friends and professional dancers Morgan Harrison and Ross Thompson. This raucous show celebrates their friendship, showcases the duo's immense talents, and spotlights the love they have not only for performing but for each other.
activities.introduction: Professional dancers and best friends Morgan Harrison and Ross Thompson display their triple-threat skills at this night of dance and debauchery.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: The history and benefits of alternative medicine.
activities.longDescription: After a brief history, our acupuncturist will walk you through the benefits of alternative medicine for reducing physical pain, calming stress and easing digestive conditions. The workshop explains why acupuncture may be a better alternative to drugs and surgery for particular ailments, and how Chinese herbs can help to lead a naturally healthier life. At the end of the workshop, you'll be able to book a 15-minute complimentary consultation with the acupuncturist.
activities.introduction: Acquaint yourself with the history and benefits of acupuncture, followed by a complimentary consultation.

activities.shortDescription: A mesmerizing comedy hypnosis show.
activities.longDescription: Bill Wheeler makes the audience the star of the show, bringing willing participants on stage and putting them in hypnotic trances. In this state, they'll experience heightened creativity, increased relaxation, and sharpened mental empowerment. Whether you're up on stage fully immersed in the hypnotic experience or safely watching from afar, Wheeler's hypnosis performance is a mesmerizing blend of comedy and mental magic.
activities.introduction: Get ready to laugh a Bill Wheeler brings bold audience members on stage for the experience of a lifetime.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.displayName: Festival Stage: John Milligan - (Almost) Piano Man
activities.shortDescription: The best musical mix between Queen and Elton John.
activities.longDescription: Experience the ultimate musical extravaganza with John Milligan performing some of Elton John's timeless classics, with a couple of surprises thrown in. Prepare to be thoroughly impressed by John’s soaring vocals and piano mastery, but it's his innate flair for being naturally his entertaining self on stage that will undeniably leave you craving an encore!
activities.introduction: Experience the ultimate musical extravaganza: "Queen + Elton," a sensational fusion of Queen's iconic anthems and Elton John's timeless classics.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: The opening of Virgin's onboard casino.
activities.longDescription: Whether you're a seasoned gambler or just dipping your toes into the world of table games for the first time, our casino is open for business. From card games like texas hold 'em and blackjack, to more social games like roulette and craps, we've got it all. You can also test your luck in tournaments throughout the voyage, if you're feeling extra lucky.
activities.introduction: Roll the dice at Virgin's onboard casino. Try your luck at our table games.

activities.displayName: Klub Rubiks: Not your average 80s party
activities.shortDescription: Not your average 80s party.
activities.longDescription: Don your favorite 80s fashion and join our Happenings Cast on the dance floor as we explore our favorite bits about this unforgettable decade. Like, don't be a dweeb and let's have a totally tubular night to the max.
activities.introduction: A celebration of the most loved & hated decade.
instructionDetails: Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open at the posted start time, and space is limited.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.

activities.shortDescription: Start your day with fellow solo Sailors.
activities.longDescription: Enjoy a hit of caffeine with a side of shiny new friendship. At this meetup hosted by our Happenings Cast, you can sip your choice of tea, coffee, or espresso as we discuss the day’s happenings. (And keep an eye out for more chances to mingle with other solo Sailors as the voyage continues.)
activities.introduction: Let us jump-start your morning with coffee — and a mixer to connect you with other solo Sailors.

activities.shortDescription: Live to play, play to win — big.
activities.longDescription: With plenty of space and games to choose from, make (money) moves to the casino ‘cause the slots are open. From classic faves to slot tournaments, there’s a chance you may end up heading home with some extra cash — besides a tan and amazing new memories.
activities.introduction: Make the most of your exclusively adult voyage by heading over to the (now opened) casino slots.

activities.displayName: Book Club at Sea: Grab Your Copy
activities.shortDescription: Pick up your book club copy and get reading.
activities.longDescription: If reading more is just something you haven’t had time to do (who has the time?!) — you’re in luck with multiple sea days to sit back, relax, and fill your mind with some epic tales (while undertaking your own). Grab your copy now and start reading. Additional book club meeting times will be posted during your voyage. Better hurry — there is a (very) limited selection available.
activities.introduction: We’re offering two different books to be discussed during your voyage — only 30 copies per book.

activities.shortDescription: Compete in the ultimate jigsaw puzzle competition.
activities.longDescription: All those years of puzzling will finally piece together during the ultimate jigsaw puzzle challenge. With commentary provided by the Gamer, you and your teammates will take on a 300 piece jigsaw puzzle and race to see who figures it out first, thus becoming the ultimate Puzzle Master.
activities.introduction: Do you have what it takes to compete in one of the biggest puzzle competitions on the water? We’d like to sea you try.

activities.displayName: Rated V: A Virgin Movie - My Big Fat Greek Wedding
Time for a Treat: History of Timepieces
activities.shortDescription: The history of watches from Swiss timepiece expert
activities.longDescription: Our highly-curated and specialized meet-up led by Swiss timepiece experts is for those of you on board who have all the time in the world to tell time. Join us for this historical chat that involves a Q&A plus some one on one time for you to ask any and all questions about the complexities of creating a modern Swiss watch. Just be sure to be…on time.
activities.introduction: Join our Swiss timepiece experts for a history of all things watches — a timely treat for the true enthusiasts on board.

activities.displayName: On-the-Upswing Bungee Class - Book On Board!

activities.shortDescription: Learn the scientific secrets of everlasting youth.
activities.longDescription: Getting in shape for beach season? The Thermage® system is a non-invasive radiofrequency therapy that can help smooth, tighten and contour skin for an overall younger-looking appearance. In this seminar, you'll meet our resident MediSpa physician and get the inside scoop on how Thermage can fight the aging process through face, neck, and stomach treatments. Not only will you gain confidence, you'll finally get the rocking beach bod you've always wanted.
activities.introduction: Get the skin you've always wanted by learning how to tighten and contour your skin, keeping you looking young and radiant.

activities.shortDescription: A comedian famous for her unique storytelling.
activities.longDescription: Comedian Kat Davidson is known for spinning everyday life into comedy gold, and she's been doing it for over 25 years. Now, she's taking the stage at sea. Join her on a comedic journey for all ages.
activities.introduction: Kat Davidson's lightning quick jokes and ability to weave a hilarious yarn will leave you in stitches.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: It's an onboard karaoke night, Sailors.
activities.longDescription: Just by being here on board, you're a bonafide star. Don't even try to fight it, it's the truth. So indulge that very truth and join the Happenings Cast for a wild night of tunes, trills, and togetherness. Everyone has their favorite karaoke song, so come show us yours. And your star power behind it.
activities.introduction: Sing your heart out, Sailors.

activities.displayName: Club Night Featuring Guest DJ Kolarz - "Golden Years"

activities.shortDescription: Exclusive 2.5-hours tour of our lady ship.
activities.longDescription: Get an exclusive look into our operations in a 2.5-hours behind-the-scenes tour with 10+ stops across our lady ship. Visiting areas reserved for our Crew and top-secret spaces you’ve never even dreamed of, you’ll learn the creeds we live by, sea how we create a one-of-a-kind experience for our Sailors. That’s all we can say for now, but if we could add one thing more, it’d be “you won’t want to miss this.”
activities.meetingPlaceName: On the Rocks, Deck 6 Roundabout, Deck 6

activities.introduction: Peek through the velvet curtain and discover how we Make Ship Happen in an exclusive tour across your lady ship.
instructionDetails: Certain non-Sailor facing areas might have limited accessibility, please contact Sailor Service for information before booking.
Closed toe shoes must be worn on this tour.
activities.deckLocation: On the Rocks, Deck 6 Roundabout, Deck 6

activities.shortDescription: Challenge your mind with some morning brain games.
activities.longDescription: If you’re a morning person (even if morning means 1 pm), it’s never too late to start your day with some brain games. Come solo, bring a friend, or grab your squad, and prepare yourself for some mind melting challenges that range from riddles, anagrams, crosswords, sudoku, geography quizzes and more psyche-satisfying games to get your inner wheels turning.
activities.introduction: Swap coffee for mind benders (or do both!) and start your day off right-brained (or left) with mind-bending brain teasers.

activities.shortDescription: An informal educational art class.
activities.longDescription: Join the Artist at the Draught Haus for an educational art class designed for all skill levels looking for either an intro into the world of art or an opportunity to hone their skills. Sailors will learn how to use the tools needed for a variety of artistic styles, so you can go home and impress your friends with your newfound art ability.
activities.introduction: Learn still lifes, figure drawings, and shading techniques, in this introductory art class.

activities.shortDescription: It's blinged and bing'd... with the Diva herself.
activities.longDescription: Let’s be clear — this isn’t your grandparents' bingo (but that's fun, too). No shade, but lots of tea here as the Diva hosts this raucous, uniquely Virgin, game of bingo. Make sure to arrive early to grab a card, a cocktail, and start the party. Oh, and don't forget... calling a false bingo will absolutely make you the Diva's latest plaything. Bingo card sales end 15 minutes prior to the event.
activities.introduction: The Diva is your hostess for this bingo event, but don’t let the sun-up-situation fool you—this is a full-blown party.
instructionDetails: Bingo card sales start prior to the event.
Bingo Card Sales end prior to the show.
Once show starts cards can no longer be purchased.
There is a cost to purchase bingo cards.

activities.displayName: Tournamentys: The One with the Slots
activities.shortDescription: Tournament-style game of slots.
activities.longDescription: It’s a slot tournament with a Virgin twist. When you sign up for the tournament, you’re assigned a slot machine number and a session time to play. When it’s your time, head to your machine and wait for our cast to tell you when to start—and it’s off to the slot-slinging races for you. It’s the perfect opportunity to meet other Sailors and maybe even make some extra ca$h.
activities.introduction: The excitement of opening night is permeating the whole ship—including the casino, so head to the slots for the sweet sounds of your future winnings.

activities.shortDescription: Learn the tasting techniques every sommelier use.
activities.longDescription: In this sensory journey through the world of wine tasting, you’ll learn how to examine appearances, colors, clarity, and viscosity, identify the intricate aromas dancing in each glass swirled, and dive into the realm of taste by sipping through different varieties to decipher the flavors and characteristics that make each wine unique. By the end of this immersive wine-tasting sesh, you'll have all the tools you need to flex your senses in any wine scene with finesse and confidence like a boss.
activities.introduction: Swirl. Smell. Savor. Learn how to appreciate the nuances of red wine like a pro in a 60-minute wine-tasting class at The Wake.
instructionDetails: Please note this event may be filmed for Virgin Voyages' marketing materials
By attending this event, you consent to photography, video recording, and its release for promotional purposes

activities.displayName: A Star to Steer By with Susan Hazlett
activities.shortDescription: Learn the skills of maritime navigation.
activities.longDescription: From the days explorers first ventured away from their home coasts to the cutting-edge technology on modern-day ships, the art of wayfinding has been evolving for centuries. Now you can learn all about the history of wayfinding and navigation technology.
activities.introduction: Sailors are still perfecting the skills and technology to navigate ships across the world.

activities.shortDescription: Take a peek inside the ultimate self-care refuge.
activities.longDescription: Thinking about making wellness part of *this* journey? Head over to Redemption Spa to see how. With restorative spaces and stylish surroundings, this self-care haven features a mud room, salt room, sauna, and steam room — plus hot and cold plunge pools for the ultimate dose of Vitamin Sea. This session gives you the chance to talk to our Crew about how you can get the maximum restorative experience by visiting the spaces where the ultimate self-care journey is waiting for you to begin yours.
activities.introduction: Wellness isn’t about the destination — but our Thermal Suite is the perfect restorative stop along your journey.

activities.shortDescription: Six cocktails. Two bartenders. One raucous party.
activities.longDescription: Bottoms up! Come ready to taste the finest cocktails our mixologists can whip up during three themed rounds of competition: one focused on drinks with fresh-squeezed juice, one with a spicy kick, and one final showcase of drink-mixing skill and flair. Sailors will vote on the winners for each round and crown a champion at the end — but with six different taster cocktails and music to dance to, no one's going home empty-handed. Stick around afterwards for a mixer.
activities.introduction: Sit back and watch Virgin's world-class bartenders engage in a mix-off to win your heart.
instructionDetails: Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: Settle in for a night of Nintendo Switch favorites
activities.longDescription: Nintendo Switch Night in the Social Club is a chance for you to get your game on and test your skills against loved ones or other Sailors. It's a great way to meet new friends, settle old gaming grudges, and prove once and for all that you're actually as good at Mario Kart and Smash Bros as you think you are.
activities.introduction: Whether you're looking for a casual game night or a tournament-style melee, head to the Social Club for a night of Nintendo Switch.

activities.shortDescription: A true standout in the musical comedy scene.
activities.longDescription: Performing on comedy stages for over 25 years, Mick Meredith's comedy transcends generational boundaries, captivating audiences of all ages. Thanks to his versatility, he's cemented his status as one of the world's best musical comedy performers, taking his show to stages from North America to the Middle East.
activities.introduction: Mick specializes in story, ad-lib, and musical jokes. Don't be surprised if he breaks out the guitar!
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: Libations and (glamorous) musical vibrations.
activities.longDescription: On The Rocks is the most electric nightclub at sea, but with the Hostess. You'll be treated to table and bar service with access to the On The Rocks mixology-forward spirits including classic cocktails to new age libation creations. With your drink in hand, rejoice in The Hostess’s collection of songs and stories — the perfect blend of red hot revelry aboard our red hot lady ship.
activities.introduction: Being the head-turning-diamond, dripping-glam goddess she is, The Hostess will treat you to old school twists on new school tunes.
instructionDetails: This event is on a first-come, first-served basis.
We will be using a virtual queue to manage the entrance.

activities.displayName: Rated V: A Virgin Movie - Wonka

activities.shortDescription: Chapter Two: Literary themes of crime & horror.
activities.longDescription: Bookworms beware: this after-hours literary affair won't resemble any experience you've had at a library. Lola — alongside a cast of characters like her nerdy assistant Dewey and Mary the bossy maid — will take you through the eclectic book collection of a mysterious Mr. Dick, a wide array including fantasy and fairy tales, crime, horror, and more. Somewhere between cocktail party and immersive cabaret, Lola's Library is an entire evening experience, so feel free to come and go as you please.
activities.introduction: Lola — resident librarian, vocalist, and comedienne — is the star of this cheeky, twisted cabaret featuring acrobats, dancers, and other surprises.
instructionDetails: Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.shortDescription: A musical duo playing the classics from every era.
activities.longDescription: Akimbo is a music duo from South Africa who embellish a broad variety of cover songs and original music. This unique duo will combine many different genres and eras, from the 60's to the present, with beautiful vocal harmonies, steel string guitars, ukulele, keyboard and an intricate percussion setup.
activities.introduction: This musical duo from South Africa will give you the best songs from the 60's to the present.

activities.shortDescription: Chapter Three: Mr. Dick's Book of Love.
activities.longDescription: Bookworms beware: this after-hours literary affair won't resemble any experience you've had at a library. Lola — alongside a cast of characters like her nerdy assistant Dewey and Mary the bossy maid — will take you through the eclectic book collection of a mysterious Mr. Dick, a wide array including fantasy and fairy tales, crime, horror, and more. Somewhere between cocktail party and immersive cabaret, Lola's Library is an entire evening experience, so feel free to come and go as you please.
activities.introduction: Lola — resident librarian, vocalist, and comedienne — is the star of this cheeky, twisted cabaret featuring acrobats, dancers, and other surprises.
instructionDetails: Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.displayName: Book Club at Sea - Romantic Comedy by Curtis Sittenfeld
Perfect Your Posture: An Alignment Workshop - Book On Board!

activities.shortDescription: Either you can, or you can try to name that tune.
activities.longDescription: Did you know that the Beatles original band name was, The Quarrymen? Well now you do, and there’s more where that came from — so if you love music, dance, and trivia, this holy trinity is the perfect way to get your night started. We’ll spin the tunes that will be sure to keep you guessing — or singing We Are The Champions — get into the groove with some retro classics, unexpected surprises, and the top hits inspiring you to just dance — da da doo-doo-mmm.
activities.introduction: Music makes the people come together — and duke it out with trivia.

activities.shortDescription: An educational event on the history of TAG Heuer.
activities.longDescription: Swiss Watches are the embodiment of luxury, a style statement recognized the world over. TAG Heuer, founded in 1860, is among the most famous Swiss Watch brands. Specializing in "avant-garde" chronographs favored by athletes and other celebrities, TAG Heuer keeps up with cutting-edge technology while staying true to the craft's traditions. This educational event will tell you all you need to know about the iconic brand's rich history.
activities.introduction: TAG Heuer is one of the most iconic Swiss Watch brands. This educational event will give you a glimpse into the brand's history.

activities.displayName: Festival Stage: Ross Thompson & Morgan Harrison
Mind Mangler: Member of the Tragic Circle
activities.shortDescription: First Come, First Serve.
activities.longDescription: Mind Mangler, the chronically bad magician with an over inflated ego, for whom nothing can go right. Experience a night of tragic illusions that will astound and amaze! This new comedy is created by the award-winning MISCHIEF, the team behind the global smash-hit The Play That Goes Wrong. This interactive comedy about a magician's attempts at mind reading and prediction is 'a guaranteed night of laugh-filled, mind-bending silliness that will leave audiences gasping for breath.’ (Broadway World).
activities.introduction: Hilarious new play direct from London’s West End, by comedy masterminds MISCHIEF.
instructionDetails: Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: An exciting musical duo from Barbados.
activities.longDescription: Taking you from Bob Marley to Rihanna, dance hits to lounge tunes, Ocean Eyes does it all. This husband and wife duo from Barbados delivers their performance through the vibrant sounds of guitar and cajon, coupled with their harmonious vocals. You'll never know what to expect with their random inclusion of musical games, story telling and "odd" genre combinations. Just know, you're in for a special treat.
activities.introduction: Husband & wife duo combining modern pop, the classic, jazz and more with their Caribbean, Barbados flavor ~ Not your everyday acoustic music.

activities.displayName: Rated V: A Virgin Movie - Mamma Mia!
Club Night Featuring Guest DJ Ella
activities.shortDescription: Soul, funk, and disco vibes elevate every hour.
activities.longDescription: Where music serves as a universal language, DJ Ella stands as a beacon of unity bringing people together through the power of sound. Hailing from the city of Brighton, UK, DJ Ella is synonymous with electrifying beats and seamless transitions, making her a sought-after name in the world of open format DJing. With a kaleidoscope of musical genres at her fingertips and an extensive collection that spans across eras and styles, DJ Ella has crafted unforgettable soundscapes for over a decade.
activities.introduction: From blissful summer days to celebratory nights, Ella Durston has blended a soundtrack to create your perfect atmospheric backdrop.

activities.shortDescription: The music of the soul-working man.
activities.longDescription: Dynamic entertainer, Slam Allen, uses the genres of Blues, Soul, R&B — and a touch of Rock and Roll — to deliver powerful soul-stirring performances. Slam captivates with a voice that echoes Otis Redding, a guitar that immerses you in B. B. King, and a stage present reminiscent of James Brown — all while capturing Sailors' hearts with his own original music.
activities.introduction: Internationally renowned. Endlessly talented. And a messenger of love.

activities.shortDescription: Our cycling and spin class powered by Technogym®.
activities.longDescription: Powered by Technogym® technology, our indoor cycling classes are made to feel like you’re on a real outdoor road. With immersive content and an inspirational environment to see, hear and feel the ride — Sailors will cycle through uphill pushes, fast downhill rides and threshold-pushing sprints. The music helps set the pace as you challenge yourself from start to finish.
activities.introduction: Zoom through peaks and valleys — if you’re missing where you’re at, just take a look at the waves outside directly from your bike.

activities.shortDescription: Make dining reservations easier at our help desk.
activities.longDescription: Calling all foodies! If you're looking for any assistance with dining reservations or simply someone to answer your culinary questions about any of our 20+ onboard eateries, stop by our Dining Reservation help desk.
activities.introduction: Trying to find the perfect dining reservations? Check out our help desk for all your dining needs.

activities.shortDescription: A sweat session for all experience levels.
activities.longDescription: Designed for anyone trying to achieve the perfect on-the-go full body workout at sea, Body Bootcamp keeps you in shape even while you indulge in all the vices of vacation. Led by The Balancer, this workout class includes exercises for all muscle groups and all skill levels, leaving you feeling stronger and healthier.
activities.introduction: Bring a pair of shoes and get ready for this inclusive workout sesh.

activities.displayName: Book Club at Sea - A Gentleman in Moscow by Amor Towles

activities.shortDescription: Summertime arts and  crafts.
activities.longDescription: Friendship bracelets, keychains & potholders - throwing it waaayyyy back to the good old days of summer camp arts & crafts.
activities.introduction: Do the words “compete”, ”sports”, or “race” give you anxiety? Fear not — this craft sesh was made for all you creative (inner) kids.

activities.shortDescription: Learn about the art of tattooing and piercing.
activities.longDescription: Always wanted to learn what it takes to actually give someone a tattoo? Or how piercing really works? Well, now's your chance. This event hosted by our Squid Ink Manager and Tattoo Artists brings Sailors through the art of tattooing. It covers setting up a tattoo station, choosing needles and ink, and hygiene and safety protocols. After the workshop, there will be a coloring competition with a special prize.
activities.introduction: This tattoo workshop takes you through the ins and outs of tattooing and piercing, guided by experts.

activities.shortDescription: A skincare workshop focusing on a 5-step ritual.
activities.longDescription: In this interactive and engaging workshop, you'll learn about the three most common skin types and the products that work best for them. Our wellness manager will demonstrate an effective 5-step skincare ritual that helps promote healthy and glowing skin, while explaining the benefits of regular professional facials. At the end of the workshop, the wellness manager will walk you through which facials onboard would work best for your skin type.
activities.introduction: Become versed in the art of skincare, focusing on a 5-step ritual that helps you maintain healthy skin.

activities.shortDescription: A street performer with an extensive bag of tricks
activities.longDescription: We can confidently say you've probably never seen another artist like Jack Shepherd before. With an extneisve background in street performing, Shepherd toes the line between musician and engineer, specializing in everything from rock and pop to hip hop and folk. He plays homemade guitars, beatboxes, loops, strums, sings, raps, self-harmonizes, and tap-dances across custom-made music machines, to deliver a truly unique experience for audiences.
activities.introduction: Jack Shepherd is a street-polished performer and deft loop artist who does everything from playing guitar to beatboxing.

activities.displayName: Dance Class with Ross Thompson & Morgan Cane Harrison
Behind the Glimmer of Lab-Grown Diamonds
activities.shortDescription: Learn all about lab-grown diamonds.
activities.longDescription: Lab-grown diamonds feel and look just like earth-grown diamonds, but there are several important differences. This educational event is all about lab-grown diamonds. You'll learn how they're created, and why they're more ethical and sustainable. And if you choose to purchase any onboard, you'll save on tax and duty free pricing.
activities.introduction: Sip champagne while you learn all about the ethics, sustainability, and creation of lab-grown diamonds.

activities.shortDescription: An interactive, highly-caffeinated gameshow.
activities.longDescription: The Roundabout is center stage for this battle royale for a free spiked latte and the grand title of Grounds Master. Four lucky Sailors will be plucked from the crowd to participate in a series of coffee-related challenges, ranging from trivia to walking the runway with a hot latte in hand. You'll even work with a barista to create the wildest custom foam art imaginable. The Sailor with the most beans* in their cup** (points* on their board**) at the end of the game wins the coveted prize.
activities.introduction: In this java-centered competition, showmanship is key. Join The Happenings cast and your onboard baristas to test your coffee knowhow and win a prize.

activities.shortDescription: Derby-style live seahorse racing with a twist.
activities.longDescription: And by races, we mean our faux-horse track, complete with seahorses. Dust off your Derby best and come cheer on your favorite (sea)horse. After the dice are rolled, the owners are tasked with a variety of challenges or given the option to spin the wheel and compete to move the seahorses forward. It’s ridiculous, it’s wild and in the end, there can only be one winner.
activities.introduction: It’s off to the betting track for a (sea)horse race with a wild and boisterous twist.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.shortDescription: Improve your flexibility in slow flow yoga class.
activities.longDescription: With a focus on improving flexibility and breath, our traditional slow-flow yoga class consists of slow-flowing, strength-building movements and are punctuated by quiet moments of reflection. Sailors of all levels are welcome.
activities.introduction: Open your heart... specifically to heart-openers at slow-flow yoga.
instructionDetails: A no-show fee of $10 - which will be donated to charity partners applies to all our fitness classes in not cancelled 24 hours prior to the class.

activities.shortDescription: A soulful Dublin-based duo with epic harmonies.
activities.longDescription: Stray Melody is a Dublin-based duo whose signature style features a combination of cajon-based percussion with vocal harmonies, nylon guitar looping, and a host of extra vocal and instrumental effects. Their trademark sound builds from mellow to anthemic and envelops listeners within a soundscape of infectious grooves and catchy hooks.
activities.introduction: Vocal harmonies, pounding beats, and soaring guitar lines. A unique and uplifting soulful electro-acoustic musical experience.

activities.shortDescription: An immersive dinner party and spectacle.
activities.longDescription:
Doomed love, acrobatics, and an unforgettable dinner party with unlimited sparkling rosé: a one-of-a-kind experience developed by Randy Weiner. A decadent feast for the senses, it's equal parts cabaret, world-class culinary experience, and theater spectacle, and you'll journey alongside The Chanteuse through the entire tale.

Don't miss the pre-show experience that kicks off when doors open.

“Floor” seating surrounds the action.
activities.introduction: A dinner party and performance hosted by The Chanteuse – with bottomless bubbles and an exclusive four-course menu.
instructionDetails: Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
This performance includes an exclusive four-course menu and unlimited sparkling rosé.
Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.
Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.

activities.shortDescription: An immersive dinner party and spectacle.
activities.longDescription:
Doomed love, acrobatics, and an unforgettable dinner party with unlimited sparkling rosé: a one-of-a-kind experience developed by Randy Weiner. A decadent feast for the senses, it's equal parts cabaret, world-class culinary experience, and theater spectacle, and you'll journey alongside The Chanteuse through the entire tale.

Don't miss the pre-show experience that kicks off when doors open.

“Balcony” seating gives you a bird’s-eye view of the action.
activities.introduction: A dinner party and performance hosted by The Chanteuse – with bottomless bubbles and an exclusive four-course menu.
instructionDetails: Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
This performance includes an exclusive four-course menu and unlimited sparkling rosé.
Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.
Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.

activities.shortDescription: Play by day — relax and reinvent by night.
activities.longDescription: Our award-winning thermal suite’s steam, mud, and salt rooms, plus hot & cold plunge pools are yours to discover on the ultimate restoration journey. You’ll receive a complimentary skin lab consultation and a $50 treatment voucher to take your regimen further, and participate in a guided Elemis skincare facial. With fizzy bevvies on hand — grab a plush robe and slippers, kick back in a massage chair, lounge on heated hamam benches, and get ready for an elevated night of unparalleled restoration.
activities.introduction: Quartz loungers. Plush robes. Head-to-toe mud scrubs. Treat your skin-to-soul during Redemption Spa’s exclusive thermal night.
instructionDetails: There is a $99 charge for this event, chargeable at Redemption Spa at check in.
$50 Treatment voucher is valid for Redemption Spa services, on port days only.

activities.shortDescription: See if you really know your other half.
activities.longDescription: Think you know all your husband's secrets? Truly believe your sibling shares everything with you? Learn the truth by playing this game show that tests your knowledge of your spouses, partners, siblings, and friends. Prove you know them as well as you think you do, or discover some new dark secrets.
activities.introduction: Join the Happenings Cast in the Dock House for a game show that tests whether you really know your loved ones.

activities.shortDescription: Pub crawl kicking off at Sip Lounge.
activities.longDescription: This traveling-pub-crawl-slash-moving-party begins at Sip Lounge, then weaves you through the ship’s can't-miss bars and spots. You'll enjoy a bevvie and snack (on us) at one of our four stops — with special missions at each locale. It’s all about connecting with other Sailors and finding your people. Oh, and don't forget to look chic, you'll be in good company.
activities.introduction: If you feel like a siren of sea travel, join us on a pub crawl perfect for the whimsical, seafaring Sailors among us.
instructionDetails: There is a charge for this event.
Please let the host know of any food allergies and/or dietary requirements.
Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: A team scavenger hunt in the Red Room.
activities.longDescription: Test your wit, agility, and competitiveness in this indoor scavenger hunt. You'll be divided into teams to search for items that match those inside The Diva's oversized purse, with points awarded per item. Compete in 3 rounds of hilarious categories to determine the winner.
activities.introduction: Hunt for items from The Diva's oversized purse in this competitive team scavenger hunt.

activities.shortDescription: Relaxed Mediterranean vibes and an ocean breeze.
activities.longDescription: At The Dock, we're serving up Balearic beats, tropical house, and soulful global grooves — music engineered to keep you in a zen state of mind for a maximum amount of time.
activities.introduction: Daybeds, open air, and views of the ship's wake provide the perfect atmosphere to chill — with musical accompaniment designed to match the mood.

activities.shortDescription: Recover and restore muscles with foam rolling.
activities.longDescription: Indulge your muscles in some well-deserved post-workout TLC with a half hour of foam rolling. Increase your range of motion, decrease soreness and reduce stress through rolling sequences, while experiencing the oh-so satisfying benefits of myofascial release.
activities.introduction: 🎵Rolling in the deep🎵... of your very sore and very tight muscles.
instructionDetails: A no-show fee of $10 - which will be donated to charity partners applies to all our fitness classes in not cancelled 24 hours prior to the class.

activities.shortDescription: A versatile musical trio.
activities.longDescription: Led by two singers, this powerhouse trio infuses their performances with hidden treasures and popular hits from across the decades. You'll find yourself getting out of your seat, moving your feet, and grooving the night away.
activities.introduction: This musical trio floats your boat with a combo of popular hits and catchy lesser-known gems from around the world.

activities.displayName: Live Life Colorfully ft. the Art of Miriam Castillo
activities.shortDescription: Adult-painting party.
activities.longDescription: In this interactive experience with The Artist, you'll bring a black&white mural into full, technicolor life. This mural, created by NYC and Yucatán-based artist Miriam Castillo, was created for Virgin and features her style, celebrating the world by exploring its intersection with creation of art. It’s your job to bring it to life by coloring in (or outside of) lines. Feel free to sip on your choice of bevs and let the music inspire your vision… even if you’re not a renaissance artist.
activities.introduction: Light up the world and our ship with color, with this adult-painting party alongside our resident artist onboard.
instructionDetails: This event will run for 2 hours, so feel free to pop by anytime.

activities.shortDescription: Meet new friends for the night ahead.
activities.longDescription: Your host for this event will kick things off by getting everyone acquainted — then, once you're cozy, sit back and enjoy a chill environment for drinks, games, and good times. We will let the group decide where the party takes you together. If things get a little rowdy, you're doing it right.
activities.introduction: If you're looking to add members to your going out squad, search no further — preGAME's got you covered.

activities.shortDescription: Sip champagne and (vintage) shop 'til you drop.
activities.longDescription: Enjoy complimentary bubbly as we walk you through the high-end vintage collections on offer from couture legends like Gucci, Louis Vuitton, and more. You'll find unique pieces to round out your onboard wardrobe, with knowledgeable crew to answer questions about styling and garment care. What Goes Around Comes Around is a premier destination for pre-owned luxury clothing and accessories, and we're thrilled to feature their top-tier selection on board.
activities.introduction: Come join us to give a warm welcome to NYC vintage mainstay What Goes Around Comes Around.

activities.shortDescription: A global comedy powerhouse.
activities.longDescription: Mickey D is a comedy whirlwind that blends boundless energy, an infectious smile, and a razor-sharp wit into performances that captivate audiences globally. From Everest heights to the buzz of international stages, his humor and energy have stormed comedy scenes, earning him global acclaim and coveted TV features. Now, it's your chance to witness Mickey D's high-voltage comedy — live and unleashed.
activities.introduction: Join Mickey D in a world-class comedy experience that's both exhilarating and hilariously unforgettable.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: A high-energy band playing the hits.
activities.longDescription: A high-energy band known as one of the most fun and prolific party bands in the US, Forward Motion is rocking the boat with your favorite danceable hits from the 70s to today. Formed in 2016 in Los Angeles, the band specializes in performing hits across multiple genres and decades.
activities.introduction: Forward Motion is playing your favorite hits, from the 70s to today.

activities.shortDescription: A zen-seeking, chakra-balancing morning.
activities.longDescription: Start your morning with the most calming and balancing energy — mats laid down and ready for your arrival. After some body work, chimes indicate a transition from sun salutation to partner work in an introduction to the human subtle system, which consists of energy centers (Chakras) and the spiritual energy (Kundalini). Feel free to Namaste for a while.
activities.introduction: Start your morning at with sun salutations, chakra balancing and personal affirmations.
instructionDetails: Wear reef-safe sunscreen since this will take place outside.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
If the weather isn't on our side (we don't anticipate it, but it happens), we'll meet inside at B-Complex (Build & Balance) on deck 15.

activities.displayName: Tattoos: The Secret Language of Sailors
activities.shortDescription: Learn the secret language of the sea.
activities.longDescription: In the Age of Sail, the crew on a ship were usually from all corners of the world, yet they could tell at a glance where a fellow sailor had been and what he had done by his tattoos. Learn all about the secret language of sailors told by the tattoos they displayed.
activities.introduction: The language of the ocean isn't actually verbal, it's actually communicated through images - tattoos telling a sailor's life story.

activities.shortDescription: Discover your signature fragrance with expert help
activities.longDescription: In this session, you'll learn about the four major fragrance families (Woody, Floral, Oriental, and Fresh) that govern the perfume world. Get a sense of how each family's notes and accents, and discover how to layer fragrances to create your own signature scent. At the end, you can even do some tax- and duty-free shopping, so that your signature scent becomes a take-home memento of a memorable vacation.
activities.introduction: Fragrance isn't one-size-fits-all, and finding the right scent is a delicate art. Luckily, our Beauty Lounge experts are on hand to help.

activities.shortDescription: No pain, all gain — intro to a pain-free lifestyle
activities.longDescription: Because tips are always included, we’re offering you a few pointers (wink) from our onboard acupuncturists. This complimentary consultation will get to the heart of where many of life’s discomforts start — the gut. Whether it’s digestive issues, weight loss, menopause, or headaches, this customized session will examine what’s going on inside, and shed some light on how the benefits of acupuncture will relieve these issues, allowing you to thrive internally, externally, and everywhere in between
activities.introduction: Intro into the heart (head, neck, and gut) of where tension, joint pain, and headaches begin during this complimentary acupuncture consultation.

activities.shortDescription: Taste the flavors of Greece at this daily event.
activities.longDescription: To celebrate the launch of Resilient Lady in Athens, Opa Hour is an ode to the Greek culinary tradition. Held in the Dock and Dock House on all three ships, Opa Hour will feature a Greek-inspired food and beverage menu in addition to the usual offerings. So sit back, relax, and snack on souvlaki and sunset views.
activities.introduction: Opa Hour showcases the vibrant flavors of the Mediterranean with curated food and beverage menus inspired by Greek culture.

activities.shortDescription: Learn about the different watch styles onboard.
activities.longDescription: From the history of Pilots watches to the mechanics of how timepieces work, you'll learn all about the different watch brands and styles we have onboard. To sweeten the deal, while you're growing your watch expertise you'll also be sipping top-flight Scotch.
activities.introduction: Savor top-flight Scotch while learning about the history of different watch brands, and the ins and outs of how timepieces work.

activities.shortDescription: A world renowned pianist and entertainer.
activities.longDescription: Deryn is a world renowned consummate pianist and entertainer. He was classically trained at the age of four has never been away from the piano since. From traveling the world entertaining as a soloist to being in many well known bands he leave you amazed by his classical skill and talent.
activities.introduction: With over 35 years of experience both as a soloist and in theater, he is one of the most skilled pianists.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: A celestial evening of storytelling.
activities.longDescription: For one night only, The Dock is transformed into an ethereal and mystical space where the night sky whispers its secrets. You’ll be welcomed to the Dock, which has been transformed into a celestial world, and our Astral Storyteller will begin recalling mythical stories found in the stars. Get completely lost in the night sky and find your way home at Stargazers.
activities.introduction: Venture out to sea and into the sky with this celestial and romantic evening regaling tales of the stars.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.shortDescription: 80s-inspired retro workout class in The Manor.
activities.longDescription: Come and get into the day-glow 80s groove. During this full-body workout, you’ll move and groove to a throwback soundtrack full of well-known, high-energy dance anthems to inspire everyone to “dance,” “with somebody,” or "feel the hee-eee-eeaat.”
activities.introduction: An over-the-top flash-back to the golden age of exercise videos and 80s personalities.
instructionDetails: Wear something to move in and close-toed shoes.
The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
This event starts on time.
“No show” spots will be released prior to your workout.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.
There will be a standby line 5 minutes prior to your calories crying.

activities.displayName: Plate, Snap, Eat: Foodie Photo Workshop
activities.shortDescription: A culinary plating, photography, and dining event.
activities.longDescription: In this bottomless brunch Test Kitchen workshop, The Foodie will take you through a multi-step lesson on plating, presentation and photographing your chosen meal — before digging in and devouring your esthetical edibles. You’ll leave with all the sacred tools necessary for making food look as good as it tastes on social media… because let’s be honest, it rarely translates.
activities.introduction: It’s all about the ‘gram, baby. And with picture perfect presentation, you can leave the filters for the “influencers.”
instructionDetails: Space is limited, so make sure to make your reservation here.
There is a charge for this event.
Please let the host know about any dietary restrictions or allergies.
Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: Perfect a 10-minute morning skincare ritual.
activities.longDescription:
Life is hectic, and most of us aren't celebrities who can devote hours on hours toward our skincare routine. But that doesn't mean you don't have time to properly care for your skin with the right education and the right products. Our skincare experts will walk you through the best products to preserve and protect your skin — all within a routine that is manageable on a normal* person's morning.

 

*You're far from "normal" — you're fabulous, frankly — but you get what we mean.
activities.introduction: Learn how to care for, prep and protect your skin in just 10 minutes every morning.

activities.shortDescription: The Gamer is showing their cards.
activities.longDescription:
Join us for a fast-paced game of bingo. And because it's hosted by the Gamer, you never know what tricks they'll have up their sleeve.

(Spoiler: it's a lot)

Bingo card sales start 45 minutes prior to the event and end 15 minutes prior to the event.
activities.introduction: G-A-M-E O-N, Gamers!
instructionDetails: Bingo card sales start prior to the event.
Bingo Card Sales end prior to the show.
Once show starts cards can no longer be purchased.
There is a cost to purchase bingo cards.

activities.displayName: Gut On Track: Wellness Workshop - Book On Board!
Around the World in 80 Minutes with The Diva
activities.shortDescription: An over-the-top drag cabaret you'll never forget.
activities.longDescription: Our fabulous drag queen, the Diva, is here and she is ready to take you on a journey around the world through song, stories, ridiculousness and, of course, lots and lots of lewks. Grab a cocktail and join The Diva in the Manor for an experience unlike anything you've ever seen at sea. Or on land for that matter.
activities.introduction: The Diva has arrived, and ma'am, she is serving.
instructionDetails: This is event is on a first-come, first-served basis.
Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.
Reserving seats for Sailors who are not present at the venue is not allowed.

activities.shortDescription: Challenge your mind with problem solving games.
activities.longDescription: If you’re a morning person (even if morning means 1 pm), it’s never too late to start your day with some brain games. This session the topic will be focused on puzzles and crosswords. Come solo, bring a friend, or grab your squad, and prepare yourself for some mind melting challenges that range from crosswords, puzzles, quizzes and more psyche-satisfying games to test your logic.
activities.introduction: Swap coffee for mind benders (or do both!) and start your day off right-brained (or left) with puzzling brain teasers.

activities.displayName: Naval Traditions and Etiquette with Simon Harden
activities.shortDescription: The unspoken rules of the sea.
activities.longDescription: Most Naval Services across the globe rely on good order and discipline to function effectively, and their traditions and etiquette still play an important part in how they operate. Join Simon, who's spent 34 years in the British Navy, for a lesson on the do's and dont's of life at sea.
activities.introduction: Learn all about the traditions and etiquette that govern life at sea!

activities.shortDescription: Fuse health and well-being with iconic luxury.
activities.longDescription: NASA calls this frequency — which hovers around 8 Hertz, for the scientifically inclined — "Earth's heartbeat," and NIH-approved studies have shown that Philip Stein's proprietary technology reduces stress, improves sleep, and boosts energy amongst wearers. Their Wellness and Sleep Bracelets resonate this frequency with your body, strengthening its bio-magnetic field to tune you into the natural impulses you'd have without the bustle of modern life. (They're also pretty, which never hurts.)
activities.introduction: At this educational event, you'll learn how upscale brand Philip Stein harnesses Earth's Natural Frequency in its watches and sleep bracelets.

activities.shortDescription: A standup show packed with clever observations.
activities.longDescription: ou don't usually go to a comedy show to get life tips, but you might just leave Kel Balnaves' show with a new perspective on life. This standup performance doesn't take itself too seriously -- it's all about hilariously mundane observations, and relatable anecdotes -- but there's a very real chance you'll leave with a brand new outlook, too.
activities.introduction: Kel Balnaves' comedy is rooted in relatable stories, funny anecdotes, and clever observations about life.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.displayName: VV Cabaret: A Night of Love Songs
activities.shortDescription: Take a melodic journey through the book of love.
activities.longDescription: We've cultivated the ultimate vocal cabaret that paints the perfect picture of love. Take a journey with us through some fan favorite love songs, from classics to new age hits, there is a song to touch each Sailor’s inner romantic. Sit back and relax through the decades, celebrating love along the way.
activities.introduction: Join us while we sing some of your favorite heartfelt scores.

activities.shortDescription: Discover the world's latest sports obsession.
activities.longDescription: Put on some comfy clothes and get ready to break a sweat because you're about to fall in love with Pickleball — the world's latest sports obsession. All you need to play is a couple of paddles, a ball, and a net, and we got it all ready and waiting for you at the Sports Court on Deck 16. But before joining us for a match, you must know one (very important) thing: learning to play Pickleball is incredibly easy... the hard part is stopping. Trust us, we know.
activities.introduction: Quick to learn, social, and a lot of fun, Pickleball is a fast-paced sport that combines elements of tennis, badminton, and ping-pong.

activities.shortDescription: A dance class that gets your hips grooving.
activities.longDescription: This remixed dance class on The Perch is all about getting your feet moving and putting you in the party mindset. Learn 2-step dances like the cha cha, the grapevine, and other adult-friendly moves, grooving to music that's sure to keep the deck bopping.
activities.introduction: Learn popular dances ranging from the cha cha to the grapevine, courtesy of our onboard dance pros.

activities.displayName: Sustainable Skin Care & Sun Care Workshop
activities.shortDescription: Learn how to safely protect your skin from the sun
activities.longDescription: There’s really no rival for a sun-soaked morning, but doing that safely is of utmost importance. Our beauty experts will teach you the effects of the sun on your skin and hair, and how to enjoy the outdoors while preventing damage to yourself and the world around you (ahem, reef-safe sunscreen, please!).
activities.introduction: Learn the importance of skin care and how best to protect yourself from the sun — while still being able to enjoy the benefits of that sweet vitamin D

activities.shortDescription: A pairing class that will elevate your taste buds.
activities.longDescription: Join us for a luxurious Champagne tasting experience. Savor three unique champagnes, paired perfectly with the classic and savory dish of fried chicken. Unleash your taste buds and indulge in a delightful and surprising pairing.
activities.introduction: Indulge in Bubbles & Bites: A Champagne & Fried Chicken Affair, a pairing class that will elevate your taste buds.
instructionDetails: Please note this event may be filmed for Virgin Voyages' marketing materials
By attending this event, you consent to photography, video recording, and its release for promotional purposes
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: A trivia game all about cross-cultural immersion.
activities.longDescription: The great thing about a cruise is meeting people from all over the world. What better way to really get acquainted with your fellow Sailors than by playing this trivia game, focusing on international countries and cities? You'll be challenged to think like the Sailor sitting next to you in this multi-round game of majority rules, with a chance to bring home the top prize.
activities.introduction: Join the Happenings Cast in the Dock House for a trivia game designed to help you connect with fellow Sailors.

activities.shortDescription: Find out what makes vintage Rolex's so appealing.
activities.longDescription: No brand is as synonymous with luxury quite like Rolex. At this event, our Swiss timepiece expert gives Sailors an informative presentation on the history of Rolex, and the benefits of buying certified pre-owned ("pre-loved") Rolexes. While sipping on complimentary champagne and scotch, you'll find out why collecting vintage luxury watches is the hottest new trend.
activities.introduction: Dive into the history of Rolex and learn why vintage luxury is so popular right now.

activities.displayName: Club Night Featuring DJ Kolarz - "Disco Vibes"
Social Walk with the Happenings Cast
Book Club at Sea - Tom Lake by Ann Patchett

activities.shortDescription: Get down with the Balancer and pump it up.
activities.longDescription: For fitness fanatics — or those looking to give working out a try before getting roped into a gym membership — the Balancer is here to push you (without being pushy) during this guided full-out cardio session. Whether you're a beginner or have tons of experience — get down in the judgment-free zone with this circuit based interval training sesh that will be sure to get your heart rate up, your sweat flowing, and that glimmering feeling of true hard work.
activities.introduction: Get your heart rate pumping with a little bit (or a lot, if you prefer) of cardio in this fast-paced course for all fitness levels.

activities.shortDescription: Casual encounters with the ship's resident charmer
activities.longDescription: The Charmer is not only our lady ship's resident magician, but also the consummate host. You may be charmed by the impromptu close-up magic, or perhaps it’s The Charmer’s mystifying personality that draws you in. So keep your eyes peeled; these roaming magic performances throughout the ship can mystify you at the most unexpected moments.
activities.introduction: The Charmer keeps you captivated with his impromptu magic performances around the ship.

activities.displayName: Master Beverage Class: Path of the Negroni
activities.shortDescription: Learn about this famous cocktail at Extra Virgin.
activities.longDescription: The Negroni cocktail elegance is in its blend of Campari, sweet vermouth, and gin. As an Italian classic, it inspires variations that have created the "Negroni Family Tree" and enamored bartenders worldwide. Come sip different types and learn why.
activities.introduction: The Negroni cocktail is simple yet sophisticated, considered the definitive Italian cocktail. Come sip all things that lead to the Negroni and beyond.
instructionDetails: Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
Please note this event may be filmed for Virgin Voyages' marketing materials.
By attending this event, you consent to photography, video recording, and its release for promotional purposes.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: Live auction to become proud seahorse owners.
activities.longDescription: At the start of the voyage, you'll have the opportunity to wage your best bids in a lighthearted, live auction to become proud seahorse owners who will eventually compete in Horseplay. After giving life to your seahorse through a private workshop with our resident artist, your personalized (and personally named) seahorse will compete to take home the glorious cash-prize and the most hilarious bragging rights on the ship.
activities.introduction: 50-dollar bid now y’abletabid 75 bid 100—it’s time to bid on the soon-to-be-winning seahorse of your jockey dreams.

activities.displayName: Castaway: Lost at Sea with Susan Hazlett
activities.shortDescription: Hear the real stories of castaways.
activities.longDescription: "Castaway" isn't just a Tom Hanks movie. Unfortunately, it's been a reality for people and boats for hundreds of years. In this talk, you'll hear some of the most epic stories about ships and castaway survivors throughout the centuries.
activities.introduction: Discover stories of boats adrift and castaway survivors in the dangerous seas.

activities.shortDescription: Gravity-defying workout suspended by bungee cords.
activities.longDescription: This gravity-defying, low-impact workout helps lengthen and tone your body, while increasing agility and mobility. Suspended by bungee cords, you’ll experience a one-of-a-kind sensation of weightlessness — a real treat in today’s hectic world — while gracefully moving through a sequence of dance and aerobic exercises.
activities.introduction: Ditch gravity for the day while toning your body in our bungee class.
instructionDetails: Athletic shoes are required for this class.
A no-show fee of $10 - which will be donated to charity partners applies to all our fitness classes in not cancelled 24 hours prior to the class.

activities.displayName: DJ Ella at the Dock House "Motown Moments"

activities.shortDescription: Casual encounter with the most charming character.
activities.longDescription: The Charmer is not only our lady ship's resident magician, but also the consummate host. You may be charmed by impromptu illusions, or perhaps it’s The Charmer’s mystifying personality that draws you to the show. Or maybe it’s simply your charms that charm The Charmer.
activities.introduction: Optical illusion or just good old fashioned magic show will be sure to keep you spellbound by The Charmer.
instructionDetails: This is event is on a first-come, first-served basis.
We will be using a virtual queue to manage the entrance.

activities.shortDescription: Bubbles and a survey of Italian craftsmanship.
activities.longDescription: You're no stranger to the finer things — you're on a Virgin Voyage, after all. Indulge your taste for luxury and head to the High Street, for a brief lesson on the history of Italian fashion-house BVLGARI. You'll take in 138 years of hand-made artistry, from the Liz Taylor-favored Serpenti bracelet to the Octo Finissimo (the thinnest wristwatch in existence) — all while sipping complimentary bubbles.
activities.introduction: Founded in Rome in 1884, BVLGARI is a giant of the jewelry industry. Get a taste of their legacy and workmanship — and bubbles on the house.

activities.displayName: Live Life Colorfully ft. the Art of Tyler Wallach
activities.shortDescription: Adult-painting party.
activities.longDescription: In this interactive experience with The Artist, you'll will bring a black and white mural into full technicolor. This mural, created by NYC-based artist Tyler Wallach, was created just for Virgin and features his distinctive style, known as, "the 1988 love child of Keith Harding and Lisa Frank." It’s your job to bring it to life by coloring in (or outside of) the lines. Feel free to sip on your choice of bevs and let the music inspire your vision… even if you’re not exactly a renaissance artist.
activities.introduction: Light up the world and our ship with color, with this adult-painting party alongside our resident artist onboard.
instructionDetails: This event will run for 2 hours, so feel free to pop by anytime.

activities.displayName: Guest Artists: Joanna Connor & the Wrecking Crew
activities.shortDescription: A legendary guitarist with a blues ensemble.
activities.longDescription: Molded by Chicago's 1980s blues scene, legendary guitarist Joanna Connor has been traveling the world with her band, the Wrecking Crew, for decades. They've shared the stage with blues, rock, and jazz artists like ZZ Top, Joe Cocker, BB King, and Jimmy Page, and you might even recognize her slide guitar solos, many of which have gone viral online.
activities.introduction: Joanna Connor is known for her soul-churning vocals and guitar skills, and her band has shared the stage with some of the world's foremost artists.

activities.shortDescription: A dynamic DJ who levels up the mood.
activities.longDescription: From Kingston, Jamaica, DJ Kolarz is more than just a DJ. He's a producer, keyboardist, bassist, guitarist, drummer, and voice-over actor, who knows how to get versatile when expressing himself musically. The life of the party, every song he plays will put you in the mood for excitement and fun.
activities.introduction: DJ Kolarz is a multi-talented artist who uses music to elevate the mood and bring the good vibes.

activities.shortDescription: Larger than life boy band choreography session.
activities.longDescription: The synchronized lasso. That jerky elbow shuffle thing. The obligatory finger-point — these endearing dance moves à la everyone’s favorite boy bands (remember 5ive?!) were all the rage during the Y2K-era and now’s your time to turn it up higher than 98º as our onboard influencers lead a jam-filled session transforming you into the next Timberlake. And even if you end up sidelining Fatone-style, you’re sure to get a hearty dose of totally 90s nostalgia while flexing some *iconic* moves.
activities.introduction: You know the songs, now learn some N’synchronized dance skills as our influencers teach you iconic boy band moves.

activities.shortDescription: Listen the best tunes of history.
activities.longDescription: Spend the night with Peruvian piano player and experienced cruise ship musician Gabriel Rios for a night of classic tunes. Gabriel mastered styles such as jazz, blues, rock, pop, Latin, bossa nova, show tunes, and more for a performance style that will suit anyone who wants to hear an accomplished pianist at their craft.
activities.introduction: Take a stroll through music history with piano player Gabriel Rios, whose mastery of genre is unmatched.

activities.displayName: Artisans of Bali: Generations of Jewelry
activities.shortDescription: Travel to Bali through the John Hardy collective.
activities.longDescription: Journey to Bali (on High Street) to hear how legends of this hypnotic island are brought to life through meditative, communal chain-weaving and meticulous craftsmanship in a collection of understated metallic necklaces, chic bohemian arm-wear, and polished bamboo creations (whose proceeds help fund replanting bamboo seedlings). The Bali workshop employs over 500 multi-generational artisans, and is committed to sustainable, conflict free methods to ethically produce timeless pieces of jewelry.
activities.introduction: Discover the origins behind the John Hardy Collection, whose handcrafted Balinese jewelry can be characterized as individual works of art.

activities.shortDescription: An afternoon tea experience at SIP Lounge.
activities.longDescription: Visit SIP Lounge for an exquisite afternoon tea experience, featuring some of the world's finest teas, complemented by indulgent light bites. Savor the opulence of White Tip Silver Needle, the pinnacle of white teas, enjoy the rare Jade Mountain Oolong, harvested just three weeks annually at high altitudes. Elevate the moment with a glass or bottle of premium champagne, adding a touch of sparkle to your afternoon.
activities.introduction: A classic afternoon tea service on sea day offering the finest teas and champagne on board.
instructionDetails: Cost is $19-35 per Sailor.
This is a first come first serve event.
Virgin Voyages' kitchens are not allergen-free environments. Please inform our crew if you have a food allergy or any other special dietary need.

activities.shortDescription: Dance, sing, and enjoy this one-man show.
activities.longDescription: Singer-songwriter, musician, and producer — Jacob Koopman is one of those artists who does it all. Born in Bali, sprinkled with Dutch roots, and now based in Dublin, Jacob’s style offers a variety of different genres that has captivated audiences from around the world. Having started off busking, he’s developed a large online following that has brought him to numerous venues and now out to sea to perform top hits from multiple decades — with his own unique twist.
activities.introduction: Street-loop style one-man band who performs both oldies and hits from today for you to sing along and dance.

activities.shortDescription: A Swedish magician specializing in illusions.
activities.longDescription: Adam Murby, renowned for his captivating magic, mentalism, illusion, and hypnosis, has captured audiences globally for over 25 years. His magical path began on a Swedish farm, where a trick taught by his grandmother sparked a life-long passion.
