Murby's performances, marked by skill, charm, and humor, leave audiences both astonished and thoroughly entertained.
activities.introduction: Experience mind-blowing magic, mystery and wonder. You must see it to believe it!
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: Get glam, glittered, & sparkled for an epic night.
activities.longDescription: For our luminous nights under the stars, our glam patrol is here to elevate your on-deck esthetic for one sensational night at sea. Make-up. Glitter. Face and body gems — however you want to maximize your look, our glamor-azzi team is here to help you make it happen. Make sure to arrive soon, as it is first come, first served!
activities.introduction: Add a little (or a lot) of sparkle to your already sparkling night...

activities.shortDescription: Sing and swing to Diva-style musical vibrations.
activities.longDescription: As the ship's grand-jewel, the Diva is known for pulling focus and turning heads. Dressed in her finest drag, this laid-back vocal set is certainly no exception. Grab a cocktail at the bar, indulge, and unwind. Feel free to sing along (or sway your head) and click your fingers to the beat as On The Rocks is the place to be!
activities.introduction: In a more intimate setting, join the ship's resident Diva as they serenade you with a selection of drag-inspired songs.
instructionDetails: This event is on a first-come, first-served basis.
We will be using a virtual queue to manage the entrance.

activities.shortDescription: Let us explain what it's all about.
activities.longDescription: Okay...so you get it. Scarlet Night is important, we've made that clear. But... what is it exactly? We like to keep it fun and mysterious so that all the incredible surprises, well, surprise you. That being said, the story behind Scarlet Night is enchanting, so if you want to learn about the myth of our lady ship's most important night, you can join members of our Happenings cast to make sure you get the most out of your Scarlet Night.
activities.introduction: A peek behind the Scarlet (Night) curtain...
instructionDetails: This is event is on a first-come, first-served basis.
We will be using a virtual queue to manage the entrance.

activities.shortDescription: Red sky at night, Sailor's delight...
activities.longDescription: On every Virgin Voyage, there's one night that reigns supreme above the rest. Welcome to Scarlet Night—an immersive celebration of the fabled love between the mysterious Goddess of the Sea and the Sailor who won her heart. Throughout Deck 7 and the Roundabout on Deck 6, the ship is transformed into a menagerie of delights and epic dance moves. Through pop-up circus performances, interactive games, karaoke, myth-telling, and live music, come pay tribute to a love that washed the world scarlet.
activities.introduction: Wear a splash of red and get ready for the dreamiest, most surprising, and heart-stirring event at sea. Scarlet Night isn’t just a dance party…
instructionDetails: Red is a must.
The adventurous will be rewarded.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.

activities.displayName: $1/$2 No Limit Texas Hold'em Cash Game
activities.shortDescription: A no-limit Texas Hold'em tournament.
activities.longDescription: On Virgin Voyages, we like our adventure the same way we like our poker: no limits. That's why our $1/$2 No Limit Texas Hold'em Cash Game has a no limit rule for our Sailors. That means the betting amounts and number of raises is unlimited, so every player can, at any time, bet as much as they wish -- including all their chips! So raise the stakes, go all in, and go home a winner.
activities.introduction: Test your poker face at this Texas Hold'em tournament, and give yourself a chance to win big!

activities.shortDescription: Sing loud, strong, all night long — with the Diva.
activities.longDescription: It’s Scarlet Night dahlings — where everybody is a star, so show off your vocal, lyrical, or harmonious talents during karaoke with the Diva herself. Everyone has their go-to song so whether you want to belt out your high-octave emotions Mariah-style, take a chance as a rapper, or keep us believing that this is a real journey of a lifetime, lose yourself in the moment — and own it — cause this opportunity comes once in a Scarlet Night.
activities.introduction: Let your inner rockstar come out by sharing your lyrical talents during Scarlet Night’s epic (live) karaoke sesh with the Diva.

activities.displayName: The Octopus Garden: The Story of Scarlet Night
activities.shortDescription: The story behind the greatest love story at sea.
activities.longDescription: The Octopus Goddess welcomes you to her garden on our epic Scarlet Night. Learn straight from the Octopus' mouth about the myth and story behind Scarlet Night's origins — the world's most romantic love story.
activities.introduction: 8 tentacles and one epic love story to tell.
instructionDetails: This event is on a first-come, first-served basis.
We will be using a virtual queue to manage the entrance.

activities.shortDescription: The can't-miss culminating party of Scarlet Night.
activities.longDescription: One of the most iconic parts of Scarlet Night, our pool party is where all the euphoria ramping up across the ship culminates. So follow the siren's song up, up, up to the pool deck to sea the finale performances of the night and to bust out your best moves alongside the Happenings Cast. This poolside dance party will undoubtedly be the talk of brunch tomorrow.
activities.introduction: Part show, part party, this iconic pool event is your final hurrah before Scarlet Night's afterparty.
instructionDetails: Red is a must.
The adventurous will be rewarded.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
It is a pool party so you MAY get wet, splashed, and the ground may be slippery.
Just an FYI for those possibly impacted —strobe, lasers and CO2 effects will be used.

activities.shortDescription: The electric afterparty you can't afford to miss.
activities.longDescription: Head over to The Manor and join us for a host of post Scarlet Night festivities. Grab a cocktail and get ready to dance until the sun comes up while a DJ spins your favorite tunes. The night ends how (and when) you want it to.
activities.introduction: After Scarlet Night (with the ship coming alive and culminating in the best party to hit the waves) the party... keeps going.
instructionDetails: Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.

activities.displayName: Origin Story: Core Basics Class - Book On Board!
Commanding a warship with Simon Hardern
Giving Back: Couples Massage Workshop - Book On Board!

activities.shortDescription: Creations and libations with the Artist.
activities.longDescription: Join the Artist for an hour of creating custom art — all while enjoying some bottomless bubbles. You don't have to be good at art, trust us, you just have to like having a good time (and you will).
activities.introduction: Everyone's a better artist with a drink or two... so let's pop bottles while we pop a bit of color.
instructionDetails: There is a charge for this event.
Please let the host know about any dietary restrictions or allergies.
Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: Contemporary tunes reimagined.
activities.longDescription: The "Hostess with the Mostest" is on board and ready to sing you through her nine, red hot tips on how to be the perfect modern Hostess. Grab a cocktail and join her in The Manor for a hilarious and sensational evening.
activities.introduction: A musical cabaret with the Hostess as your songstress.

activities.displayName: Beyond Tequila: Rituals and Stories of a Mezcalier
activities.shortDescription: Agave 101: the origins of tequila and mezcal.
activities.longDescription: With The Foodie and our resident Mixologist at the helm — and by helm we mean bar — embark on a journey from Tequila Sunrise to Midnight by Mezcal, celebrating the history, rituals, and tastes of Mexico’s most spirited, well, spirits. With a selection of our lady ship’s finest labels, discover why the heart of the agave plant is what breathes life into everyone’s favorite cocktails.
activities.introduction: From the heart of the agave plant to the mind of the Mezcalier — go through the origins, history, and rituals of  Mexico’s iconic spirits.
instructionDetails: There is a charge for this event.
Please let the host know about any dietary restrictions or allergies.
Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: Bites, beats, and libations at Pink Agave.
activities.longDescription: Get your glow on in Pink Agave’s after hours agave lounge. With our resident DJ setting the mood to start your night on the right foot — or end it (dancing) in style.
activities.introduction: With our resident DJ mixing it up, join us at Pink Agave for a celebration of life, CDMX food, and the largest tequila and mezcal collection at sea.

activities.shortDescription: Trivia with a Virgin twist.
activities.longDescription: Teams get together to play rounds of trivia for the chance to fill your jar with golden barnacles. One Sailor from the winning team of each round will get a chance to face what we call “Trial-by-Trivia” and spin the wheel. Will you lose a team member? Have the chance to sing for extra points? With wild challenges and hilarious twists, it’s far from your average trivia game.
activities.introduction: Pop on some socks, a white button-down and shades and slide into this far-from-average trivia game.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.displayName: Club Night Featuring DJ Kolarz - "80s Vibes"

activities.shortDescription: Not your average Pub-style trivia game.
activities.longDescription: The Happenings Cast compiles the best of pop culture, history, current events and beyond in a uniquely multi-round trivia event created for your voyage. Each team will have a booklet to fill out for each round of 10 questions. But this isn’t your average trivia game—this Salty Trivia expands beyond generations, giving you the freshest, funniest brain-twisters you can find on the open ocean (or anywhere, for that matter).
activities.introduction: A pub-style trivia game in the Loose Cannon—created uniquely each day.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.shortDescription: Learn the fundamentals of a strong core workout.
activities.longDescription: Our core class teaches the fundamentals of a strong core, through a series of exercises designed to help strengthen your lower back and define your abs. You may not walk out with six-pack, but you’ll be one step closer.
activities.introduction: The onboard workout class that gives a little more to your core.
instructionDetails: A no-show fee of $10 - which will be donated to charity partners applies to all our fitness classes in not cancelled 24 hours prior to the class.

activities.shortDescription: Relaxed Mediterranean vibes and an ocean breeze.
activities.longDescription: At The Dock, we're serving up Balearic beats, tropical house, and soulful global grooves — music engineered to keep you in a zen state of mind for a maximum amount of time.
activities.introduction: Daybeds, open air, and views of the ship's wake provide the perfect atmosphere to chill — with musical accompaniment designed to match the mood.

activities.shortDescription: A workout so fun, you won't realize it's exercise.
activities.longDescription: If dragging yourself to the gym just isn't how you want to spend your Virgin Voyage but you’d like to break a sweat, this event is for you. Zumba is more party than fitness class, set to a contagious blend of Latin and international rhythms that provides a fun and effective workout. Developed in Colombia, this method combines low-intensity and high-intensity moves for an interval-style, calorie-burning dance party. It's every bit as feel-good as an 80s music video, but the leotard is optional.
activities.introduction: Half dance party + half aerobics session = a full-body workout that will leave you feeling bouncy and energized.

activities.shortDescription: Get the inside scoop on all things vintage.
activities.longDescription: The great thing about vintage? It's always in style. At this special event, our luxury experts give you the inside scoop on all things vintage, from vintage luxury handbags to certified pre-owned watches. Whether it's Chanel, Louis Vuitton, Gucci, or Rolex, you'll learn the benefits of collecting vintage luxury -- all while enjoying a complimentary glass of champagne.
activities.introduction: Learn why vintage luxury is the way to go, with inside details on vintage Chanel, Louis Vuitton, Gucci, and Rolex products.

activities.shortDescription: Irish comedian known for mixing comedy and magic.
activities.longDescription: This Irish comic is truly comedic gold with his specialty of combining comedy with magic. All the way from Northern Ireland, Patrick McCullagh has entertained audiences around the world with his comedy. Now he's bringing the one-liner magic to Virgin Voyages.
activities.introduction: This Irishman is truly comedic gold and will keep you entertained with his magic, comedy and wit.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: Chapter One: Literary themes of fantasy & romance.
activities.longDescription: Bookworms beware: this after-hours literary affair won't resemble any experience you've had at a library. Lola — alongside a cast of characters like her nerdy assistant Dewey and Mary the bossy maid — will take you through the eclectic book collection of a mysterious Mr. Dick, a wide array including fantasy and fairy tales, crime, horror, and more. Somewhere between cocktail party and immersive cabaret, Lola's Library is an entire evening experience, so feel free to come and go as you please.
activities.introduction: Lola — resident librarian, vocalist, and comedienne — is the star of this cheeky, twisted cabaret featuring acrobats, dancers, and other surprises.
instructionDetails: Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.
Please note that the Manor doors will not open until the published start time.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.displayName: Club Night Featuring Guest DJ Ella - "Flower Power & more"
DJ Kolarz at the Aquatic Club
activities.shortDescription: A splash of afternoon sunshine.
activities.longDescription: At the Aquatic Club, it's all about good energy. You'll hear a mix of current and classic pop, Latin, reggae, hip-hop (of the chill, non-explicit variety), dance, minimal house music, and remixes. Perfect for poolside lounging — cocktail optional.
activities.introduction: Vibe out in the midday sun with strangers, lovers, and everyone in between.

activities.shortDescription: Curated gaming pop-up at The Social Club.
activities.longDescription: Hosted by The Gamer, you'll have the opportunity to pick from their specially curated trunk of vintage, classic and ultra-modern games. From Cards Against Humanity® to Settlers of Catan® and everything in between and beyond, there’s a place (and game) for both the newbies and the serious players.
activities.introduction: Join The Gamer as we transform The Social Club into a pop-up board game café for a select few hours a day.

activities.displayName: Live Painting Demo with the Artist

activities.shortDescription: Our high-intensity interval training class.
activities.longDescription: HIIT (high-intensity interval training) is a full-body, circuit-based, fat-burning workout through quick, intense bursts of exercise, followed by short, sometimes active, recovery periods. HIIT will help get (and keep) your heart rate up and burn fat in less time, while improving your stamina and agility. It’s not for the faint of heart, but it feels so good afterwards.
activities.introduction: Don’t stop, HIIT it, HIIT it…
instructionDetails: A no-show fee of $10 - which will be donated to our charity partners applies to all our fitness classes if not canceled 24 hours prior to the class.

activities.displayName: Handcrafted Excellence from Uno De 50 Jewelry
activities.shortDescription: Learn all about UNO de 50's unique jewelry.
activities.longDescription: Join UNO de 50, a luxury jewelry brand, as they showcase their one-of-a-kind pieces not found anywhere else in the world. This limited-time experience will give you a crash course in some of the world's most beautiful, handcrafted jewelry from the brand's past and current collections.
activities.introduction: This limited-time experience will highlight the brand's rare, one-of-a-kind pieces from across their curated collection.

activities.shortDescription: Hairstyling workshop and demonstration.
activities.longDescription: The first of you to arrive at the workshop will receive the free hair style demonstration, and will get to act as the model for the day. Depending on the day of the workshop, our hair stylists will create a themed style for a relevant event. If it’s the day of Scarlet Night —it's an over-the-top, touch-of-red hairdo; or if we're gearing up for one of our ultra-glam pool parties, it's the perfect, beachy waves to complement a breezy night spent with a cold drink in hand.
activities.introduction: Work with our onboard hair stylists to learn how to create the most iconic looks for all kinds of events on (and off) the ship.

activities.shortDescription: A high intensity HIIT Pilates class.
activities.longDescription: This HIIT Pilates class combines traditional Pilates movement with the intensity of interval training, all with a stunning ocean view. Feel strong while getting your heart rate up and breaking a sweat. This class is accessible for beginners and advanced exercise gurus.
activities.introduction: A heart-pumping HIIT Pilates class at The Perch.

activities.displayName: Rated V: A Virgin Movie - Napoleon

activities.shortDescription: A preventative and rejuvenating skin seminar.
activities.longDescription: Our MediSpa physician will talk you through the universal and undeniable aging process of the skin (sadly, none of us can avoid it), and what treatments are available for your varying conditions and needs. Our physician will discuss individual, safe and effective treatments—serving to provide clarity around injectable services and how they can benefit you. At the end of the seminar, you'll be able to book a 15-minute complimentary consultation with the physician.
activities.introduction: Learn about the aging process as it pertains to the skin, and get acquainted with preventative and rejuvenating measures.

activities.shortDescription: Health goals? Gain new digestive system deets.
activities.longDescription: Wellness is an ever-evolving journey to reach both short-term and long-term goals. Today, you’ll get to the core of your body by focusing on the gut — aka your digestive system, to find out the benefits of cleansing, nutrient absorption, and how to implement small lifestyle changes. By making minor improvements now, you’ll receive helpful (and healthful) info that helps prevent diseases and discomfort so that you can eat, sleep, and live life to its fullest.
activities.introduction: This workshop is here to give you all the healthy details, and help motivate you towards reaching long-term wellness goals.

activities.shortDescription: Learn the story behind this color-changing gem.
activities.longDescription: Join our onboard jewelry experts for a closer look at the rich khaki greens, salmon pinks, violets, and vivid gingers of this versatile Turkish stone, discovered as a species by geologists in 1801. Beautiful and durable, Zultanite exhibits different colors under different lights, making it a coveted stone for gem collectors; its gorgeous kiwi greens with yellow flashes are strongest under daylight, while artificial lighting brings out rich tones of champagne, pink, and raspberry.
activities.introduction: Mined in the Anatolian Mountains of southwest Turkey at an elevation of over 4,000 feet, the gem stone called Zultanite is extremely rare.

activities.shortDescription: Break a sweat as a team in this two-person workout
activities.longDescription: Sweating is always better as a duo. Whether it's your spouse, friend, sibling, or distant cousin, grab a trusted partner and work out as a team. Each exercise requires two people, so get ready to share the connection of getting stronger together through this mix of physically assisting and strengthening.
activities.introduction: A team workout designed to get you and your partner moving.

activities.displayName: Stretch and Sculpt with The Balancer
activities.shortDescription: Learn breathing techniques to help you stretch.
activities.longDescription: Ready to feel relaxed and refreshed? Get ready for a rejuvenating holistic workout with The Balancer. You'll learn how to get a full body stretch through the use of breath, guided meditation, and safe postures, all while training your muscles at the same time. By the end, you'll feel like a brand new (and more relaxed) you.
activities.introduction: The Balancer will show you special breathing techniques to help you stretch the full body.

activities.displayName: Festival Stage: Marcus Terell & the Serenades
activities.shortDescription: Vocal powerhouse Marcus Terell lights up the stage
activities.longDescription: Hailing from Kansas City, Missouri, Marcus Terell has always been inspired by gospel and Motown, and turned this love of music into his own musical group: "Marcus Terell & The Serenades." Terell and his group made it all the way to the semifinals on America's Got Talent, and now he's bringing his musical talents to the Virgin Voyages stage.
activities.introduction: Marcus Terell, one of music's rising superstars, is gracing the Virgin Voyages stage with his unique brand of gospel-inspired Motown.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.displayName: Club Night Featuring DJ Ella - "Through the Decades"
Squid Ink Tattoos & Piercings — Last Chance
activities.shortDescription: Final chance to book your tattoo or piercing sesh.
activities.longDescription: If you’re into adding some body art with a new tattoo or piercing, now’s the time in the first-at-sea tattoo and piercing parlor. Using vegan ink and hypoallergenic studs, bars, and hoops, our artists have been hand-picked by tattoo industry legend Lou Rubino Jr — the visionary behind World Famous Tattoo Ink, Soho Ink and Freshly Inked Magazine. With limited openings still available, make your memories (more) permanent by reserving a spot to get a tattoo or piercing at Squid Ink now.
activities.introduction: There’s still time (and limited space) — secure a spot in Squid Ink to decorate your body with some fresh ink or a brand new piercing.
instructionDetails: Medical consent form is required prior to appointment
Squid Ink has a rigorous hygiene policy and a 5 star rating
Tattoo will be covered with Dermshield, allowing the tattoo to breathe and heal
While Dermshield is water protective, it is not recommended Sailors submerge in water
A $200 non-refundable deposit will be taken for tattoo appointments at time of booking
Adding to agenda does not confirm booking, please visit the studio

activities.displayName: Shore Things - Explore and book your excursions.

activities.shortDescription: Shopping is an art — let your creativity soar.
activities.longDescription: Vacation is about rest, relaxation...and retail therapy. With curated collections of Swiss watches, unique jewelry, fragrances, and essential items — discover new-at-sea boutique fashion, sustainable brands, and lots of VV merch. From hand woven hammocks that empower women in business, to reef-safe sunscreen — at least 25% of our onboard brands have made a commitment to a positive social or environmental impact.
activities.introduction: Now that the shops are open, you’ll find everything you need to gift your loved ones, but most importantly, yourself.

activities.displayName: The Great Jazz Singers, Part One (1920-1950)
activities.shortDescription: Start your jazz history education with an expert.
activities.longDescription: Jumpstart your jazz education with the help of music journalist and jazz historian Allen Morrison. In this talk, he'll trace the development of the art of jazz singing from 1920-1950. With the help of classic film clips and audio recordings from major jazz figures like Louis Armstrong, Bessie Smith, Bing Crosby, Ethel Waters, the Boswell Sisters, and Billie Holiday, you'll leave feeling like you lived a little bit of history yourself.
activities.introduction: Let jazz historian Allen Morrison jumpstart your jazz education with this talk covering the art from its inception in 1920 through the 1950s.

activities.shortDescription: Grab your bingo cards before the game.
activities.longDescription: Make your way to the stage to purchase as many bingo cards as you want. As you enter, you’ll notice the DJ already has the place bumping and in full party mode — accompanied by gorgeous lighting and videos to set the mood. Trust us; you're going to want in on these games.
activities.introduction: Head to The Red Room prior to bingo to purchase your cards and get the (bingo) party started.
instructionDetails: Doors open 30 minutes prior to the show.
Bingo Card Sales end 15 minutes prior to the show.
There is a cost to purchase bingo cards.

activities.shortDescription: A fun and cheeky way to learn all about our ship.
activities.longDescription: The art and design program on board is award-winning and one of the biggest differentiators of our brand experience. So if you'd like to learn all about all the details and all the thought that went into why and how we designed our spaces, the Artist will be hosting a ship wide, art-based scavenger hunt — a fun and competitive way to experience our incredible ship.
activities.introduction: On the hunt... a gorgeous hunt.
instructionDetails: This is event is on a first-come, first-served basis.
We will be using a virtual queue to manage the entrance.

activities.shortDescription: Game show competition to name the float flavor.
activities.longDescription: Scoop, There It Is — our whimsically fabulous (and tasty) ice cream-float inspired trivia game show where a handful of Sailors (it could be you!) compete to see who has the most flavor (figuratively). Whoever wins gets to name the flavor of the day and become the star of the ship. For the day, anyway.
activities.introduction: Some will compete. Others will spectate. All will be sweetly wowed during an ice-cream float trivia challenge.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.shortDescription: A one-woman band with an impressive soundscape.
activities.longDescription: Live-looping tunes from a catalog of over 1,600 songs, Selkii is a one-woman band with an impressive soundscape. With only her guitar, insane vocals, and mad improvisational skills, she isn't afraid to take a request, spice it up with some Selkii-original flair, and make it her own. And after getting Adam Levine's chair to turn on The Voice 2019, making waves on #TeamBlake, stealing the show on South African IDOL, and getting Macy Gray's praise, she is about to win your heart.
activities.introduction: Definition of Selkii-centered 1: able to live-loop tunes from ABBA to Zeppelin 2: capable of providing (a band) for her own needs 3: Selkii-sufficient

activities.displayName: Rated V: A Virgin Movie - Oppenheimer

activities.shortDescription: Our take on a classic college party.
activities.longDescription: Amping up the competition a notch, this is a twist on classic college party games like air hockey, foosball, boxing rings, swings, and custom twists on beer pong, and water war. Teams may be matched up by where they’re from, interests, professions or favorite bevs. Winners will have bragging rights and potentially a hangover (…we’re not in college anymore).
activities.introduction: From seesaws to pong bombs—it's a tournament for the rowdy and competitive Sailor.
instructionDetails: Wear comfortable clothes and reef-safe sunscreen since you'll be outside.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.displayName: Shore Talk: Introduction to South Africa
activities.shortDescription: Get a crash course in South Africa from a local.
activities.longDescription: First time in South Africa? Join Cape Town local David van Niekerk to get his hometown tips and tricks to make the most of your visit. From unmissable culinary delights to a crash course in cultural norms, David has your back as you navigate your way around this beautiful country.
activities.introduction: Get an introduction to South African culture and cuisine as well as recommendations for must-see sites from South African native David van Niekerk.

activities.shortDescription: A fitness class that gets you moving and grooving.
activities.longDescription: Working out doesn't feel like a chore when you're moving your feet to your favorite classics. Our Feel Good Dance Fitness Class is an energetic blend of workout + dancing, where Sailors work up a sweat by dancing to songs by the Spice Girls, Tina Turner, and more. So join us for 45 minutes of grooving and calorie burning!
activities.introduction: Get a lively workout and learn some fun dance moves at the same time. This fitness class gets you moving to your favorite beats.

activities.shortDescription: A sushi & rice demonstration at The Test Kitchen.
activities.longDescription: Grab your chopsticks because, in this interactive demonstration at The Test Kitchen, you’ll get a taste of the ancient art of sushi-making, learn how to select sushi-grade fish, understand the correct way to forge a sushi knife, and get our top-secret sticky-seasoned-rice recipe. After all the tips and techniques you’ll master, you’ll go home ready to host the most epic sushi roll dinner party.
activities.introduction: Sea how we roll — from cucumber-avocado sushi to tuna poke bowl.
instructionDetails: If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: An adept Celtic fiddler and singer-songwriter.
activities.longDescription: LaGrande honed her craft criss-crossing continents as a soloist with the National Dance Company of Ireland. She has toured across North America, Europe, UK, Asia and Russia. LaGrande is a highly sought after session player on the European festival circuit. She has performed with platinum selling rock band Kodaline on Ireland’s Late Late Show, Grammy nominated Hozier, and was a soloist with Mundy at the 3 Arena in Dublin.
activities.introduction: A Celtic fiddle player and vocalist based out of the West Coast of Ireland, Meg LaGrande has toured the world, from the Kremlin to the Vegas Strip.

activities.shortDescription: Learn Durban's history and culture from an expert.
activities.longDescription: Make the most of your visit to Durban with this informative introduction with a South African native. Local David van Niekerk will give you the must-see sites around the city as well as an introduction to the fascinating mix of Zulu and Indian cultures that makes Durban so special.
activities.introduction: Take a crash course in Durban from our resident Africa expert (and South African native) David van Niekerk and get recommendations for must-see sites.

activities.displayName: DJ Kolarz at the Dock House
activities.shortDescription: A hideaway spot with a touch of sophistication.
activities.longDescription: Anything can happen tonight, and the action might just start here — backed by a track of Balearic beats, tropical house music, and soulful global grooves.
activities.introduction: Unwind from unwinding in this pressure-free hideout, where smoothly-reverberating beats create the mood.

activities.shortDescription: A mindful practice of guided meditation in a group
activities.longDescription: Embark on a journey of healing, deep relaxation and spiritual awareness as you join us on a guided meditation. Follow along as you are invited to relax the body and mind —transforming the roaring waves of the subconscious into a tranquil oasis and learning mindful practices you can take off the ship with you. Sailors of all levels are welcome to join.
activities.introduction: Let this guided meditation class be your daily mantra for reflection, vibration leveling and intention setting.
instructionDetails: A no-show fee of $10 - which will be donated to charity partners applies to all our fitness classes in not cancelled 24 hours prior to the class.

activities.displayName: Brews & Crews: The Ultimate Beer Showdown
activities.shortDescription: A rowdy beer-tasting event for the ages.
activities.longDescription: If the demure glass-swirling of a wine tasting isn't your thing, get down to the Draught Haus for a beer tasting that's more party than lecture. Line your stomach with bar snacks and take your randomly assigned paddle, the color of which (red or blue) determines your teammates for the evening. You'll learn a bit of history about each of the four beers you sample, so pay attention — the team that performs best in the after-tasting flash quiz wins another beer on us.
activities.introduction: Beer isn't a spirit, but this semi-competitive beer tasting is as high-spirited as it gets.
instructionDetails: Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: A versatile, high-energy band.
activities.longDescription: Inspired by legendary performers like Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin, Stevie Wonder, Otis Redding, Marvin Gaye, and Bruno Mars, the Chris Thomas Project is composed of some of the best musicians in Florida. Featuring an acoustic duo, quintet, 8 piece band, and marvelous 13 and 18 piece big bands, these guys are guaranteed to leave a lasting impression on any audience.
activities.introduction: This multi-piece band brings unique energy and the best musicians in Florida to to Virgin Voyages stage.

activities.displayName: Club Night with DJ Ella - Party Vibes

activities.shortDescription: Boost blood & oxygen flow by mastering the breath.
activities.longDescription: Do you ever " take a really deep breath, let it go and think, “Hmm, that felt right... I should do that more often.”? Same for most people, actually — despite it being something everyone on the planet does. In this breathing class, you’ll explore how to properly master your breath and strengthen your breathing muscles, which help boost the blood and oxygen flow to your brain and body.
activities.introduction: Explore how to correct and strengthen your breathing — because against all odds, it’s not easy as you’d think.
instructionDetails: A no-show fee of $10 - which will be donated to charity partners applies to all our fitness classes in not cancelled 24 hours prior to the class.

activities.displayName: Guest Artist: Matthew Lennox - Solo Guitarist
activities.shortDescription: Sail to the beat from a rhythmic folk-rocker.
activities.longDescription: When percussive fingerstyle guitar meets beatboxing meets cinematic sensibilities, you get Matthew Lennox — a Canadian musician who will transport you on a powerful, evocative journey through musical storytelling. Speaking from his experiences as a globetrotting street musician, you’ll be catapulted into a rhythmic experience like no other.
activities.introduction: A one-man juggernaut does it all from beatboxing to flamenco folk-rock.

activities.shortDescription: First Come, First Serve.
activities.longDescription: A game show like no other. You'll win and lose points, you'll know all the tunes, and probably end up shouting and screaming (and singing) in spite of yourself, all while having no idea WTF is going on. The Host & Assistant will entertain the hell out of you, while guiding you through to the Grand Prize, a finale like you've never experienced before. Never the same show twice. Oh, and bring your phone. If you still don't have a clue what's about to happen...perfect.
activities.introduction: A full-on riot of a show. Fast, funny and fabulous.
instructionDetails: Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.

Seats cannot be reserved or saved.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.

activities.shortDescription: Learn jazz history from 1950 to the present day.
activities.longDescription: Join jazz historian Allen Morrison for this continued talk on the history of jazz singing. He'll present the most important jazz singers of the modern era through film clips and rare audio recordings of such major 20th-century figures as Ella Fitzgerald, Frank Sinatra, Sarah Vaughan, and Tony Bennett. Then he'll introduce the current generation of spectacular jazz singers who are carrying forward the jazz vocal tradition.
activities.introduction: Continue your jazz history education with this expertly curated lecture from jazz historian Allen Morrison featuring rare video and audio clips.

activities.shortDescription: A splash of afternoon sunshine.
activities.longDescription: At the Aquatic Club, it's all about good energy. You'll hear a mix of current and classic pop, Latin, reggae, hip-hop (of the chill, non-explicit variety), dance, minimal house music, and remixes. Perfect for poolside lounging — cocktail optional.
activities.introduction: Vibe out in the midday sun with strangers, lovers, and everyone in between.

activities.shortDescription: A mixology course with guided photography.
activities.longDescription: Join us at the Test Kitchen for mixology experience where you'll learn what it takes to create cocktails using fresh fruit and vegetables, herbs, house-made mixers, flavored bitters and extracts from around the world. Oh, and obviously, with top-shelf spirits and liquor. The Foodie and the resident mixologist will guide you through the development of cocktails, from bar tools to garnishing, finishing with the most important part—snapping the most envy-inducing and share-worthy pics to Instagram.
activities.introduction: Mix, measure and muddle your way to creating three signature cocktails that are perfect for sipping and snapping.

If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: An intro course on the ins and outs of winemaking.
activities.longDescription: Love South African wine or curious to discover it for the first time? In this crash course, South African winemaker David van Niekerk will introduce you to all there is to know about the basics of winemaking in South Africa. Learn about the history of winemaking in the country, why its climate is so well suited to producing grapes, and what varieties grow best in the region. Plus you'll leave with some South African wine pairing tips to make the best of your local lunch.
activities.introduction: Discover winemaking with a South African twist from South African winemaker David van Niekerk and learn what makes the country's wine so special.

activities.displayName: Tournamentys: The One with Texas Hold'em
activities.shortDescription: Tournament-style game of Hold'em.
activities.longDescription: Shipwide, the lights will dim to a gentle red and you’ll know Scarlet Night is nigh. If you make your way over to the casino, you’ll notice it’s a different kind of red—a rustic, Texas red to match the Texas Hold’em tournament going down. So secure your red bolo, collect your red chips and prepare for a fiery win.
activities.introduction: On Scarlet Night everything is red—and that’s no exception in the casino, where the fire is burning Texas-style.

activities.shortDescription: Working up a sweat with your favorite dance moves.
activities.longDescription: Whether you are a seasoned professional, or the master of the lawn mover on the dance floor, we want you to come let loose for 45 minutes of pure dance bliss! This all inclusive class will glide through a warm up, cha cha through some groovy dance combinations, and leave you shaking it the rest of your day!
activities.introduction: Come get down at the Perch while we elevate that heart rate.

activities.shortDescription: Park dazzles with guitar riffs and violin loops.
activities.longDescription: To survive multiple residencies in the ultra-competitive performer mecca of Las Vegas, talent isn’t a mere asset — it’s a requirement. Luckily, crooner and guitar virtuoso Daniel Park oozes the stuff. From Lily Bar & Lounge at the Bellagio Hotel, to Mandarin Bar at the Mandarin Oriental, audiences all over Vegas have been captivated by Park’s melodic voice and thoughtful lyrics. Hot off his latest stint at the Rosewood in Phnom Penh, this seasoned chanteur is turning his eye to the high seas.
activities.introduction: This soulful folk balladeer with a modern twist bares it all in his intimate shows.

activities.shortDescription: An immersive dinner party and spectacle.
activities.longDescription:
Doomed love, acrobatics, and an unforgettable dinner party with unlimited sparkling rosé: a one-of-a-kind experience developed by Randy Weiner. A decadent feast for the senses, it's equal parts cabaret, world-class culinary experience, and theater spectacle, and you'll journey alongside The Chanteuse through the entire tale.

Don't miss the pre-show experience that kicks off when doors open.

“Front Row” seating puts you up close to the action.
activities.introduction: A dinner party and performance hosted by The Chanteuse – with bottomless bubbles and an exclusive four-course menu.
instructionDetails: Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
This performance includes an exclusive four-course menu and unlimited sparkling rosé.

activities.shortDescription: Interactive magic with Adam Heppenstall.
activities.longDescription: Award winning magician Adam Heppenstall offers it all - Incredible Magic that is guaranteed to amaze, with lots of laughs along the way! From performing all over the UK to taking his magic to the sea, you will truly be amazed with his illusions that incorporate intimate 'Close up' card manipulation and fun audience interaction in his own original style!
activities.introduction: Award winning magician Adam Heppenstall offers it all - Incredible Magic that is guaranteed to amaze, with lots of laughs along the way!

activities.shortDescription: A versatile and world-famous comedian.
activities.longDescription: Matt Reed is a hilariously funny comedy circuit favorite. His everyman style and lightening retorts have made him a comedy icon. He's been featured as a part of the Comedy Store Presents on Comedy Central, and appeared at festivals such as Bestival. Now, he's bringing his versatile style of comedy to the stage on Virgin Voyages.
activities.introduction: Hilariously funny comedy circuit favorite. There isn’t a stage or situation he hasn’t conquered.

activities.shortDescription: Come as your(fancy)self.
activities.longDescription: "We Fancy" is a party created to celebrate all the best feelings: confidence, freedom, that added bounce in your step after a compliment from a stranger. Come as the fanciest version of you and join in a night of collective exuberance, featuring glamorous, global beats from all corners. Be prepared for surprises, for traveling around the world via music — and for a WOW moment not to be missed.
activities.introduction: Report to The Manor for a no-holds-barred celebration of all of us.

activities.shortDescription: A dynamic and upbeat jazz quintet.
activities.longDescription: Manny Kellough leads this all-star quintet featuring the incredible stylings of vocalist, Azure McCall. The M.K. Quintet performs classic jazz compositions as well as lively pop hits that have entertained audiences worldwide. Now they're coming to the Virgin Voyages stage!
activities.introduction: Upscale jazz quintet led by world class drummer Manny Kellough.

activities.shortDescription: Flow it out in our rhythmic vinyasa flow class.
activities.longDescription: Zen seekers will find that no two Vinyasa yoga classes on board are ever the same — and that’s because it’s tailored for the day’s energy. Breath-synchronized movements and postures flow seamlessly together, as the class oscillates between rhythmic and naturally connected sequences that strive to increase strength and connect more deeply to your breathing.
activities.introduction: Flow it out on the waves in our vinyasa yoga class on board.
instructionDetails: A no-show fee of $10 - which will be donated to charity partners applies to all our fitness classes in not cancelled 24 hours prior to the class.

activities.shortDescription: Tone, strengthen, and stretch.
activities.longDescription: In the scenic setting of The Perch, The Balancer will walk you through a workout that combines elements of barre, pilates, and yoga for a full-body strengthening and toning experience. Wrap up with a long, restorative stretch to promote circulation and get you on the right foot for whatever your day has in store.
activities.introduction: Take a restorative, invigorating class with a view of the ocean.

activities.shortDescription: Learn how to taste wine like an expert.
activities.longDescription: Want to become a wine expert in just one night? Learn the ins and outs of wine tasting from South African winemaker David van Niekerk. By the end of the night, you'll know everything from the proper way to hold your glass (yes, there is one!) to how to use your senses to fully experience a wine from head to toe.
activities.introduction: Unleash your inner sommelier with this crash course in wine tasting, wine pairing, and all things vino from an experienced South African winemaker.

activities.shortDescription: An interactive demonstration at The Test Kitchen.
activities.longDescription: Join us for an interactive, demonstration-style cooking class and discover the techniques behind two of our eateries’ most iconic mushroom-inspired dishes: The Test Kitchen’s Mushroom Mousse and Razzle Dazzle’s Mushroom Tartare.
activities.introduction: Learn how we make magic with mushrooms.
instructionDetails: Please note this event may be filmed for Virgin Voyages' marketing materials

activities.shortDescription: A mildly caffeinated educational experience.
activities.longDescription: We've been sipping tea and enjoying its benefits for at least 6,000 years — trillions of sips. But why? Join our Crew at Test Kitchen and learn about the origin of tea and its categories, how to analyze and taste its four main styles, and get an inside look into our partner-ship with JoJo Tea. After this 60-minute experience specially designed for tea lovers, you'll never see a humble cuppa the same way again.
activities.introduction: Heat Water. Make Tea. Connect with others and soothe your soul.

activities.displayName: Perfect Your Posture: An Alignment Workshop
activities.shortDescription: A postural alignment workshop and analysis.
activities.longDescription: In this workshop, our fitness instructor will walk you through the common causes of postural imbalance and how our feet (and our foundation) may be contributing to any discomfort or pain you may be experiencing. When working out or simply going about your daily activities, there are minor adjustments you can make to help overall posture and joint alignment. At the end of the workshop, you'll receive a complimentary footprint and posture analysis.
activities.introduction: Learn about the common mistakes that can contribute to postural alignment issues and joint pain.

activities.shortDescription: A parody of the classic “Mexican Bingo” game.

But there’s a twist: at Loteria Gigante, everyone's a winner because your entry ticket already comes with a margarita and paloma. ¡Salud!
activities.introduction: Get ready for this lady-ship comedically-inspired fiesta curated by Unfiltered Hospitality.

activities.shortDescription: A steaming-hot cupping class.
activities.longDescription: Anyone can taste and compare coffee flavors — so we’re raising the (coffee) bar with an interactive cupping class for you to experience the tasting process used by industry professionals and transform your daily caffeine-fix ritual forever. Learn the nuances and intricacies of different hand-selected varieties from all around the world in an authentic cupping class curated by Intelligentsia Coffee.
activities.introduction: To bean or not to bean — that is the question.

activities.shortDescription: First Come, First Serve.
activities.longDescription: This cutting-edge immersive experience tells the tale of Persephone, whose descent into the Underworld caused the earth to fall into winter (and whose return brought spring back to the land — the ancient Greek explanation for seasons). Journey along as she explores a rock-n-roll Underworld outfitted with lavish couture costumes and decidedly non-ancient lights and tech. (You'd be on the edge of your seat anyway, but the audience stands for the duration of the show, so be prepared.)
activities.introduction: An electric retelling of the Greek myth of Persephone — featuring death-defying circus stunts, heart-pounding dance numbers, and soaring vocals.
instructionDetails: Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
This show is standing room only, and includes optional ADA accessible seating on Deck 7.
Because of the nature of this being an immersive experience, please use caution when moving around the room before, during and after the performance.
Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.displayName: Move & Flow: Healthy Bevvies On The Go
activities.shortDescription: Find the best fruit and veggie-forward libations.
activities.longDescription: Join our Happenings Cast for a "move & flow" as they take us through a tour of restorative beverages and discussing healthy lifestyle choices. Recover with likeminded sailors as you sip, stroll and soak in all our lady ship has to offer.
activities.introduction: This traveling juice bar walkabout weaves you through the ship’s can't-miss juice and smoothie spaces.
instructionDetails: Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: Effortless, personable stand-up from Scotland.
activities.longDescription: A native of Edinburgh, his agreeable stage persona handles a range of anecdotes — from becoming a dad to the bizarre phenomenon of dog Instagram accounts — with good-natured bewilderment and shrewd observational humor. Waugh has stormed New York's off-Broadway scene to open for the city's big-name headliners, and now he's hitting the Virgin decks.
activities.introduction: Audiences across the UK have been tickled by Gareth Waugh's friendly, disarming stand-up sets.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: Dance the night away to this party soul group.
activities.longDescription: A high-energy party soul group, Tapes is the best thing to come out of Australia since the Bunnings sausage sizzle. Their unique blend of disco, soul, RnB, funk, and hip-hop will keep you dancing until your feet are sore.
activities.introduction: Disco, soul, funk, RnB, and hip-hop - Tapes truly does it all.

activities.shortDescription: An American Blues-Rock Band.
activities.longDescription: The Matt O'Ree Band is a couple-fronted band known for putting their own unique spin on blues-rock music while honoring the classics. Former touring guitarist for Bon Jovi, Matt won the "King of Blues" guitar contest hosted by BB King himself and was also inducted into the NY/NJ blues hall of fame. Matt’s wife Eryn, an accomplished artist and songwriter in her own right, won awards such as the BELK Southern Musician Blues and many more.
activities.introduction: The Matt O'Ree Band is a Blues-Rock band influenced by musical legends like the Allman Brothers, Led Zeppelin, Aretha Franklin, & more.
